import Header from'./components/Header';import BigImage from'./components/BigImage';import About from'./components/About';import Menu from'./components/Menu';import CartSidebar from'./components/CartSidebar';import Team from'./components/Team';import SignIn from'./components/SignIn';import Footer from'./components/Footer';import SignUp from'./components/SignUp';import ProductDetail from'./components/ProductDetail';import{AuthProvider}from'./context/AuthContext';import{CartProvider}from'./context/CartContext';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AuthProvider,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CartProvider,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"app-wrapper",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Routes,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"main-content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Header,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(BigImage,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(About,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Menu,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CartSidebar,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Team,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Footer,{})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/sign-in",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"main-content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Header,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(SignIn,{})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/sign-up",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"main-content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Header,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(SignUp,{})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/:category/:id",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"main-content",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ProductDetail,{})})})]})})})});}export default App;
